name: Blupillar

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.desc: Damaging moves used by the opponent will not have an additional effect.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes (Secret)
abilities.desc: The possessor's compound eyes boost its accuracy by 1 stage.

description: Blupillar are easy to train and can grow quickly, making them ideal for new trainers. They can spill silk in order to entangle their foes and when the silk within them is thick enough, it can then be used for cocooning. Blupillar also glow at night.
